name: Empty Spaces
description:
Designer
Steven Suarez

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Spring 2017

Engine
Unreal

Genre
Physics Puzzle

Description
Empty Spaces is a three-stage key and lock puzzle game where a player must obtain and bring an item to a location in the current room they are in, which will in turn open the path to the next room. Entrancing graphics are mixed with physics-based gameplay to create a short, engrossing puzzler.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
